Html:
Hello,

i have developed an addin for Outlook. This addin queries a server for customer data that is replaced in the email template the user has opened. What i want to do is display informations about the server request like Status codes.

But i don't find any example thats showing how to access the statusbar ... or i'm blinded :P
Can someone please help me and provide a small sample how to do this with netoffice?

Thank you and best regards,
Marcus

I will give you some food for thought: 
CommandBar bar = mApplication.ActiveExplorer().CommandBars["Status Bar"];
But I don't know what to do next...sorry!
